page.title: 20TEXT_PROJECT SCHOOLS,PRESTON
page.content: Participating Schools: Children, & Teachers DG Dalgleish,JA McGurty,Mr M Omyon at{ST.LEONARD'S CE SCHOOL;}Chil_ dren, & Teachers A Potter,Mr PA Sloan at{KINGSFOLD C P SCHOOL;}Children, & Teachers H Almond,SM Keane,GJ Devaney at{FRENCHWOOD CP SCHOOL.} Responsible for the texts in the Project were: Page 1,GJ Devaney;P2, A Potter; P3,DG Dalgleish/GJ Devaney; P4, G Hough/H Parker; P5,J Kenworthy; P6,J Shaw;P7,G Smith;P8,SJ Field;P9,I Desai/S Ahmed;P10,I Munshi;P11,P Chau_ han/R Champaneri;P12,GJ Devaney;P13,J Chesters; P14,A Flannery;P15,P Baxen_ dale;P16,I Kazi/P Patel;P17,S Ishmail; P18,D Eccles;P19,J Batty.Pages 1 to 20 edited &/or co-written &/or written, GJ Devaney. Amenities Count: Squares 1,2,5,6,9,10 by Kingsfold; Squares 3,4,7,8,11,12,by St.Leonard's and Frenchwood.
